app_message_uuid.description: The application-generated (i.e. the application that provides a service) uuid for this message. To be provided by vendors

request_message_uuid.description: If this message is created in response to a previous message, this is pub/sub the messageId of that previous message. All messages should have this field populated except for ServiceRequests

originating_message_uuid.description: The pub/sub messageId of the first message that initiated the message discourse of which this message is a part. To be copied from one message to the next

service_chain_uuid.description: A UBL generated uuid of the service-chain to which the subject of this message is a part. To be copied from one message to the next

message_timestamp.description: The time and date when this message was created. Distinct from pub/sub's own publishTime attribute. To be provided by each service on message creation

user_token.description: A UBL generated token containing details of the user and requested service. To be copied from one message to another

user_id.description: An ID attributable to a user that has made a specific request. In this implementation this is the user's Azure AD user object ID. Provided by the UBL, to be copied from one message to another

service_chain.description: A UBL generated sequence of subsequence service executions used to chain services together. To be copied from one message to another

service_provider_uuid.description: The uuid of the service provider the request is made to. To be provided by vendors

service_offer_uuid.description: The uuid of the service offer requested to be executed

service_request_uuid.description: The uuid of the original service request that resulted in a service offer that this request is asking be executed.

service_provider_signature.description: Signed token provided by the service provider to validate the originator of this message. To be provided and validated by vendors

dataset_type_component.description: A list of accepted data types. Will be expanded as additional data types are supported

dataset_details_input_component.description: A component detailing the input data requested for a particular service

data_token.description: A DAS generated token to be redeemed for either metadata or a redirect to the location of data

data_uri.description: The URI of the dataset requested to be processed

metadata.description: Custom metadata added by users in relation to a dataset

dataset_details_output_component.description: The details of the output data requested of a service

file_uri.description: The UBL-provided uri of the output data requested of a service

dataset_uuid.description: The uuid of the output dataset requested to be processed

exec_request_uuid.description: The uuid of the execution request that this messages acknowledges

exec_process_uuid.description: The uuid of the job / process / task actually carrying out the processing

status_code_component.description: A standard set of codes provided in the course of service processing
